snippet: Near the border with Italy, a farmer and his network of “citizen smugglers” have helped hundreds cross the border, in a personal response to his nation’s muddled handling of the crisis....
abstract: French farmer Cedric Herrou has become de facto leader of network of citizen smugglers helping African migrants cross into France from Italy and continue further into Europe; France has yet to settle on migrant policy, and smugglers like Herrou, who are seen alternately as heroes or scofflaws, view inaction as inhumane.
lead_paragraph: Near the border with Italy, a farmer and his network of “citizen smugglers” have helped hundreds cross the border, in a personal response to his nation’s muddled handling of the crisis.

headline.main: A French Underground Railroad, Moving African Migrants
headline.print_headline: An Underground Railroad in France, Moving African Migrants

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
